CustomField.description:
Max score 50 from 2 areas:
LARGEST GIFT SCORE: $5000 = 25 $2000-$4999 = 15 pts $1000-$1999 = 10 pts $500-$999 = 5 pts <$500 = 1 pt No Giving = 0 pts + CUMULATIVE GIFTS SCORE: >$20,000 = 25 pts $10,000-$19,999 = 15 pts $5000-$9999 = 5 pts

Max score 50 from 2 areas:
LARGEST GIFT SCORE: $5000 = 25 $2000-$4999 = 15 pts $1000-$1999 = 10 pts $500-$999 = 5 pts <$500 = 1 pt No Giving = 0 pts + CUMULATIVE GIFTS SCORE: >$20,000 = 25 pts $10,000-$19,999 = 15 pts $5000-$9999 = 5 pts
CustomField.label: Monetary Score
